website_summaries.verdict: Although it's pricey for a basic thermometer, because it's noncontact, it's one of the most comfortable options for sensitive children.
pros: Reading is displayed instantly on the screen
Noncontact measurement prevents cross-contamination among patients or family members
Buttons are self-explanatory and easy to use
Can also measure the temperature of objects like grills and baby bottles
Can store and recall up to 20 previous readings
cons: Can't clean with bleach or other household cleaners or you risk damaging the device

customer_reviews.title: Every household would need one especially if you have kids
customer_reviews.text: A must have if you have kids in the family, it does what it suppose to do, it's compact, and easy to use. We love that it doesn't require contact so it can be shared in the family. The reading was fast and it stores up to 20 past readings, really comes in handy when you forgot what the last reading was. I also like the other function that it can read temperature on objects/food, wish I got it when my daughter was younger.
customer_reviews.author: Doleman

customer_reviews.title: I’m a nurse and hoped this product would be ideal ...
customer_reviews.text: I’m a nurse and hoped this product would be ideal since many of my patients have respiratory issues and cannot use a traditional oral thermometer. It stopped working after two weeks. It now reads body temperatures as somewhere around 92 degrees. Ver disappointing as the product was fairly expensive!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gives accurate results in a split of a second
customer_reviews.text: I’m blown away by the accuracy and ease of use of this thermometer. The best part is that it’s a non contact so you can take a temperature of absolutely any object and it’ll give you 100% accurate results. I will never use any other thermometer
customer_reviews.author: Pearsons

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I have only used this a handful of times but so far I really like it. Super simple to use and accurate. We previously had one that had to be slid across the forehead and my kids would never sit still enough. And when they did sit still we would still get readings all over the board. This one is great in that it is a super fast reading and you don’t even have to make contact with the forehead!
customer_reviews.author: KMK

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical as to whether this would really work reliably. However, it does, matching temperatures gained from ordinary thermometers. It is nice that it does not have to make body contact, making having to clean it or worrying about infection control less of an issue. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: LoriD

customer_reviews.title: Should have bought sooner..,,
customer_reviews.text: Having grand babies around now, this thermometer is a MUST ! And easy to use for us "older generation" as well ! So far - seem to be getting accurate readings.
customer_reviews.author: katfish

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME! AWESOME! AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: This device is super fast, super cute, and super accurate! I work in LTC and often need to take a temp on my patients, this makes my job 10xxx easier. I only wish I could get a BP and O2 sat machine that works just as well! I would easily purchase this over and over again.
customer_reviews.author: Ani

customer_reviews.title: Great at first, then it crapped out
customer_reviews.text: At first it seemed very accurate but I’ve had it for about 6 weeks now and it suddenly only takes temperatures in the home/air setting which means that actual head temperatures are reading between 91-94 degrees for everyone in our family. Before it did that, a couple of weeks ago, my daughter had a fever and it fluctuated wildly from no fever at all to 102 with several readings.
customer_reviews.author: Kerstin

customer_reviews.title: Very Handy
customer_reviews.text: Love this device, my patients are always amazed that I don't even have to touch their forehead, has always been accurate and I use it daily as a home health nurse.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't seem very accurate.. it was consistently about 2 degrees under what actual temperature was.
customer_reviews.author: Ian M

customer_reviews.title: So nice when I need to take my daughters temp at ...
customer_reviews.text: So nice when I need to take my daughters temp at night. Now I don’t need to wake her.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Love how accurate it is. More accurate than my old ear thermometer.
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and not too expensive
customer_reviews.text: Once I set for forehead reading, worked great. I can see many uses with my wife and I and grandkids.
customer_reviews.author: J. Dapron

customer_reviews.title: Must have!!
customer_reviews.text: Quick delivery. Product is great! Accurate & great for infection control!
customer_reviews.author: Carpe Diem

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm an RN and a Mom. I've forever hated oral thermometers as they are slow, hard to hold in the right spot, and you have to wake someone to take their temperature. Same for the ear and temporal thermometers. But with this, you can turn off the volume and you get an accurate temp super fast without waking someone. I now work nights as a home care nurse. This has been invaluable!! Easy to use and see results in the dark. Great product!! I'd recommend to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: HeatherTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt work
customer_reviews.text: This product doesn't work properly. I cannot seem to get it returned for replacement so I am out the money spent. Take temp and it will not read the same if done more than one time. It is all over the place. Have to use regular old thermometer to be accurate. Today child read 97.4 on forehead scan and it was actually 101.5. I have a daycare and need something that works every time...this is not the product. Beware and if you purchase it make sure you can return it if it doesn't work. I am buying a different one as this just doesn't work well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love!! Can I give 10 Stars ?
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried sooo many thermometers, from head to recital . This is by far my favorite one!! Fast read, and matches the very accurate rectal one I have. Love love love!! So glad I finally found a thermometer that works with the right readings
customer_reviews.author: The Young

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly simple and easy to use thermometer, must have for parents of young kids!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent resource especially if you have young children. This is so easy and fast to use even if your little one squirms. This is a must have thermometer well worth the cost. We shopped less expensive models but in the end decided to spend a bit more for a medical grade devise. It comes the a nice storage case to protect it.
customer_reviews.author: JHW-California

customer_reviews.title: Must have for health care workers
customer_reviews.text: I love this thermometer!!! As a health care worker working third shift I always hate waking people to get their tempature. This makes it so much easier for me to get the temperature and also let them continue to rest...
customer_reviews.author: Rickie

customer_reviews.title: It looks really nice, but definitely not accurate
customer_reviews.text: It’s very inaccurate. I followed directions exact and the temperatures would very by up to three degrees. It looks really nice, but definitely not accurate.
customer_reviews.author: thatonegirl

customer_reviews.title: just a damn waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Measured it on a toddler when he was sick , Very inaccurate readings the forehead temperature showed 98.6 while the armpit showed 103.. too much variations .. just a damn waste of money
customer_reviews.author: Samaresh

customer_reviews.title: Quick and accurate
customer_reviews.text: Im loving this thermometer. I uae it at home as well as at work as an LPN. Quick. Accurate. Easy to wipe down. The non contact feature is excellent especially when I don't want to wake the person up. Comes with a nice, durable storage case. Small enough to carry in my scrub pocket without weighing it down. Easy to read LED face.
customer_reviews.author: carri

customer_reviews.title: Best thermometer you can buy for kids
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality product. This works quickly and accurately without having to touch it to skin. It turns red when temp is too high. Love this
customer_reviews.author: Meenagia

customer_reviews.title: Works.Easy to read. Consistent measurment
customer_reviews.text: works better than all others I have tried. consistent .. Will buy again to give to daughter.
customer_reviews.author: KenBar

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this thermometer. It's quick and accurate, great for a mother with multiple children.
customer_reviews.author: Dominique G.

customer_reviews.title: Perfection!
customer_reviews.text: THIS is how you make a thermometer. boom 1 click 1 second temp is good.
customer_reviews.author: The Last J

customer_reviews.title: Easy but not accurate
customer_reviews.text: Its easy to get a temperature off my children but its not accurate when there is a fever.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Wish we had it when our children were little!
customer_reviews.text: Quality product! Instant read... repeats accurately simple to use. Love it
customer_reviews.author: azbh36

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So easy to use and user friendly. I really like the thermometer!
customer_reviews.author: Jo Beth Lewis

customer_reviews.title: So easy and convenient
customer_reviews.text: So easy and convenient! Great digital thermometer which does not have to make contact with skin. Perfect for this flu season germs!
customer_reviews.author: DenF

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Have only had it a few days. Seems to work well.
customer_reviews.author: barbara mattern

product_meta.title: Innovo Medical FR201 Non-Contact Forehead Thermometer with Silent Mode - Digital Temperature and Fever Alert - CE and FDA Cleared
feature_bullets: RELIABLE AND ACCURATE – Clinically tested and proven to be reliable and accurate when used in accordance to instructions.
NON-CONTACT – Non-contact measurement method prevents cross-contamination. Suitable for all ages - infants, children, adults and the elderly. Safe and hygienic.
ONE SECOND READING – One button operation displays readings on the screen instantly within one second. Switches easily between Fahrenheit and Celsius and between Silent and Audible mode.
MEMORY RECALL – Can store and recall up to 20 previous readings.
PROFESSIONAL MEDICAL EQUIPMENT – Recommended thermometer by doctors and pediatricians. Comes with a portable and lightweight carrying case for protection and convenience.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
